tool_description: Creates new reward items with basic configuration including name, description, category, and initial setup parameters for the rewards catalog.

item_name.description: Name of the reward item (2-100 characters)

item_description.description: Detailed description of the reward item (10-500 characters)

category_id.description: Category identifier for organizing the reward

item_type.description: Type of reward: physical_product, digital_product, experience, discount, cashback

brand_name.description: Brand or partner name associated with the reward

error_messages: Invalid item_name: Name must be between 2-100 characters and contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, and basic punctuation.
Invalid item_description: Description must be between 10-500 characters.
Invalid category_id: Category must exist in the system. Use Category Manager to create categories first.
Invalid item_type: Must be one of [physical_product, digital_product, experience, discount, cashback].
Duplicate item_name: An item with this name already exists in the specified category.
usage: Provide item_name, item_description, category_id, and item_type as required parameters. Optionally specify brand_name. This creates the base reward item that can then be configured with pricing and eligibility rules.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the created reward item

creation_status.description: Status of the item creation (success, pending, failed)
